author: jeffrey.downard
title: Redeploy Catalyst
description: Comment développer de nouvelles communautés Cardano avec des objectifs uniques ?

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is momentarily at a draft stage, beyond the obligatory fields it contains no other information. As such, it is hard to determine wether it fits in the challenge parameters and how it would impact the ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: At this stage the proposal contains no detailed plan, timeline, budget, KPIs that would help is assessing its successful implementation.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal has no material to help in assessing its progress or success, suggest resubmitting with all the needed details in a future fund.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal doesn't say anything really. How are you going to tackle the problem you stated?
f6_assessments.q1: There is no plan or experience. This proposal can not be implemented.
f6_assessments.q2:
Funds being requested is too much and no breakdown of what constitutes the Budget,
Also, this can not be audited.

f6_assessments.q0: Good idea but its lacks the detailed implementation plan. More has to be done to bring others stakeholder to the same level of understanding
f6_assessments.q1: the experience is relevant to the success of the idea but i think it lacks the plan for a successful implementation
f6_assessments.q2: More information will be needed to improve the auditability. the plans to execute the idea, the milestone of success etc. these will be the proposal great.

f6_assessments.q0: The details provided for addressing the challenge presented is insufficient.
f6_assessments.q1: There is no work breakdown structure for the proposal. Also, it fails to provide a well-developed timeline and a detailed breakdown of the budgetary allocation for each activity the team seeks to undertake. Therefore, in the absence of a well-developed timelines for each event and a proper budgetary allocation, it will be difficult implementing the project successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: The information required in respect of metrics to gauge and track the progress and success of this proposal when funded is not sufficient

f6_assessments.q0: Given the success of the Catalyst the idea to redeploy anything like it is good but the idea needs further developments for clarity and understanding.  Bring up the goals, deployment plan for a better appreciation of the idea.
f6_assessments.q1: the idea is good but needs a lot of information: the goals, plans, the vision of success. Hope these would show up next time
f6_assessments.q2: this proposal will some information on the milestones to be achieved, the time for achieving them, and the broken-down budget associated with each milestone.

f6_assessments.q0: The solution requires more details to enable the Catalyst community to know how the proposal seeks to contribute to its ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal is lacking deliverables and outcomes. There is no road map detailing the scope of implementation of the project. How this team define success is unknown?
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal has left out the process of auditing. There is no approach to documents activities and make the project open for transparency and audit.

f6_assessments.q0: The same team have submitted 10 proposals (most of them are very alike in outcome/methods, and no apparent effect after six months and this is one of two shell/template proposals lost in transaction somehow.
f6_assessments.q1:
With 12 proposals for six months to do similar outcomes such as data gathering, workshops and legal advice, I do not believe these projects would address and expand Cardano and PRISM aggressively and can be deliverable with the listed team members. Here is the list of 12 similar proposals submitted by the same team.

1) F7: Accelerate Decentralized Identity 
DIDs for Cities ($26,000) DID
https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/DIDs-for-Cities/382636-48088
2) F7: Accelerate Decentralized Identity 
DIDs for Health Records ($21,400)
https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/DIDs-for-Health-Records/382633-48088
3) F7: Boosting Cardano's DeFi 
Model Contracts for DeFi Loans ($25400)
https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Model-Contracts-for-DeFi-Loans/382635-48088
4) F7: Lobbying for favorable legislation 
Network of policy advocates ($9700)
https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Network-of-policy-advocates/383251-48088
5) F7: A.I. & SingularityNet a $5T market 
Ethical A.I. for Singularity/Cardano ($31300)
https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Ethical-AI-for-Singularity-Cardano/382631-48088
6) F7: A.I. & SingularityNet a $5T market 
Hypotheses for A.I./Singularity Net ($26800)
https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Hypotheses-for-AI-Singularity-Net/382632-48088 
7) F7: DAOs ❤ Cardano 
Spaceship Earth DAO ($28000)
https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Spaceship-Earth-DAO/382630-48088
8) F7: DAOs ❤ Cardano 
Cardano Climate DAO ($31500)
https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Cardano-Climate-DAO/382637-48088
9) F7: Nation Building Dapps
Creating a Level Playing Field ($28000) 
https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Creating-a-Level-Playing-Field/384242-48088
10) F7: Nation Building Dapps
Smart Contracts and the Law ($32000) 
https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Smart-Contracts-and-the-Law/383250-48088
11: Redeploy Catalyst  ($30000) for 31 words proposal
https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Redeploy-Catalyst/383247-48088
12: F7: Nation Building Dapps
Education Records ($30000) for 38 words proposal - 
https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Education-Records/382634-48088
f6_assessments.q2:
Time and budget are close to identical pattern (copied/pasted)  with no detail and slightly differ in Dollar and not support-base and expected outcomes. There is no precise mechanism for Project Catalyst and the challenge team to follow and monitor your 10 proposals (minus 2 shell proposals. This is one of two shell/template proposal).

Here is a summary "Time and Budget" patterns used in 10 submitted projects with the listed team member, Law Professor.

Phase I (6 months)

Month 1: some type of "outreach" (vary $$)
Month 1-2: "Workshops" (vary $$)
Month 2: Webpage development and and Youtube channel related (vary $$)
Months 2-3: identify the issue (vary $$)
Project direction:  (vary $$)
Project oversight and evaluation by members of Board of Advisors months 1-5: (vary $$)
Legal work on guidelines for the roadmap (vary $$)
Total: (vary $$)

Phase II (6-9)
Phase III (10-12)

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal is good but the solution to the problem is vague. The problem statement is referring to goals but the proposal has not stated those goals. Since the goals are not expressly stated, I can't see any alignment between the goals and the challenge settings.
f6_assessments.q1:
The relevant experience of the proposer is stated but there is no evidence to that claim (the proposal has no links and references to prove the experience and skills required by the proposer to execute the proposal).
The proposal is lacking a team.
The budget has not been broken down into identifiable items. The proposal lacks a plan and time table for its implementation.
The proposer has not included possible risks involved in the implementation of the proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal  is lacking roadmap, milestones and time horizon for the achievement of the proposal. There are no metrics that define the success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal focuses on finding solutions to grow new Cardano communities with unique goals. This idea sounds interesting. However, this proposal is not completed [since there is no roadmap, KPIs/metrics, and budget breakdown,...], the solution is still very abstract, not a clear impact on the Cardano ecosystem as a whole. Based on the given information, I disagree with this proposal's impact, and would give it a score of 2.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer's profile is briefly described as a Business systems consultant, developer, however, there is no proof for verification. Besides, a detailed plan is not provided, therefore, there is no proof of feasibility. Based on the given information, I disagree with this proposal's feasibility, and would give it a score of 2.
f6_assessments.q2: Since there is no roadmap, KPIs/metrics, and budget breakdown,... where auditability can't be guaranteed. Therefore, based on the given information, I strongly disagree with this proposal's auditability, and would give it a score of 1.

f6_assessments.q0: A draft proposal of just 27 words asking for $30k to "Redeploy Catalyst"... There is nothing to be assessed.
f6_assessments.q1: A few disparate words without external links or profiles are not enough to convey experience about anything.
f6_assessments.q2: There is almost no information provided at all in this 27 words proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: Proposer only makes statements about the Cardano community, but does not have a specific solution to the problem of How to grow new Cardano communities with unique goals. Show us a specific solution of yours and how you would implement them
f6_assessments.q1:
The relevant experience of the proposer is Business systems consultant, developer. How many people does the team have? What is the experience of each member? Links to information about team members? I don't see any information about these. It made me feel unclear about the team of the proposal.
Besides, the proposer has not yet given a specific plan and solution to solve the problem statement
f6_assessments.q2: No information has been provided on what will be produced by when so this is not a project than can be audited.

f6_assessments.q0: Recommend the proposers to seek guidance from the Catalyst School on how to formulate a good proposal as a starting point. Perhaps they can start form Catalyst School's YouTube channel and join the Catalyst Discord channel to get to know the community. Unfortunately at the current state, this proposal does not meet any metrics. Quick remark to the proposer, the problem statement above has already it's solution called the "Challenge Setting", where individuals are asked to submit their own Challenge. Which is where the problem statement currently developed by the proposer can be transferred to.
f6_assessments.q1: Given the limited data of the team involved, the limited data of any plan of action there is no possibility this proposal will be successful. Again, please for the proposers to coordinate with the Catalyst School.
f6_assessments.q2: Due to the limited information provided, this proposal will not be able to be audited. There is also no correlation between the problem statement and solution mentioned. Ending note to proposers is to please seek out Catalyst School.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is very limited in scope leaving a lot to the imagination. One could say this is an excellent idea, quite possibly is, but without further understanding of the proposers' rationale for such an idea, there is only speculation. At his point, the proposal's impact cannot be accurately assessed. The thought is intriguing; it is recommended that the team expand upon their ideas and resubmit their proposal in the following funding round, Fund 8 if they are interested in doing so. Also, explain how your project will benefit Cardano and the community.
f6_assessments.q1: In order to evaluate this subsection, the proposer will be required to present relevant information which is not currently available in its current iteration. Please expound upon how you would implement the plans referred to in the Impact section along with production roll-out timelines. The team's area of expertise is present but it is unknown if this is relevant without a meaningful proposal plan and description.  Please provide individual experience(s), this will assist the advisors and voters, likewise, it provides transparency. The budget is poorly explained; it should at a minimum be broken down into areas of relevant expenditures.
f6_assessments.q2: Key performance indicators are missing, as are any means of community audit-ability, and most importantly, the team's view of project success. Currently, it is impossible to rate this metric. It is recommended that the team expands their proposal and include this information.  This section relates to the audit-ability, risks, delivery dates, milestones; all-important as it relates to accountability, transparency, and community support.  The team should reach out to The Catalyst School, other proposers, and members of the broader Cardano community for assistance if necessary. I highly encourage the team to refine their proposal and resubmit it in Fund 8.

f6_assessments.q0: There is no basis on which to assess this proposal as there is no link to the Challenge Goals or how this proposal provides a solution
f6_assessments.q1: No profiles or experience of team members are given, no budget is given, there is no breakdown of costs or anything at all
f6_assessments.q2: There is no timeline of activities, measurable metrics or KPIs or anyway to audit anything

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is very much in its infancy. It is just an idea without any details. The rating provided reflect this. On a positive note its a sensible idea, packaging up and deploying the catalyst model elsewhere will add great value to other areas of the ecosystem and give kudos to the work done in Catalyst.
f6_assessments.q1:
It is impossible to assess this as no details have been provided around resources and skills, plans, deliverables, budgets, etc  
A budget of $30k has been requested without any justification or detail. The rating given reflects this.
f6_assessments.q2: It is impossible to assess this as no details have been provided around metrics, milestone, KPI's or risks.The rating given reflects this,

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal does not state a clear problem and doesn't really provide a good solution.
f6_assessments.q1: There is no team mentioned, no roadmap, no budget etc. It is hard to understand what is trying to be implemented.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal does not contain any informations. It is not possible to assess it properly. Please add more details the next time.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal doesn't really address any of the objectives of the challenge, furthermore the proposal is very much in a draft state and needs a lot more work to make it into a sensible proposal.
f6_assessments.q1: Unable to assess the feasibility of this proposal, $30K has been asked for but no details on plans, deliverables, resources and budget breakdown have been provided.
f6_assessments.q2: Unable to assess this section as no metrics, KPIs, risks etc have been articulated.  The score reflects this.

solution: Catalyst a très bien réussi à développer la communauté des développeurs. Redéployer le code de Catalyst et le modèle de construction de la communauté.
